name: Satyr
description: Satyrs are fey creatures known for their playful and hedonistic nature. They have the upper body of a human and the lower body of a goat, with short horns on their heads. Satyrs are often found in forests and woodlands, where they revel in music, dance, and the pleasures of the natural world. They are charming, witty, and have a natural affinity for magic.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.
special: Magic Resistance: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
